description: This module explores and scrutinizes the current energy and environmental problems the world is facing, by critically evaluating the main causes and finding ways to alleviate and solve them. Key topics include energy conservation, alternative or renewable energy, climate change, carbon footprint, decarbonization, pollution, forestation/reforestation and science-based policy making. Students will be poised to make a difference not just through their awareness but by translating their knowledge into concrete action.
title: Solving Energy and Environmental Problems
